update DJ_HR_USER
HEAD_IMG = #{headImg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SAP_NO = #{sapNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_SUBGROUP = #{employeeSubgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DUTY_LEVEL = #{dutyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BIRTH_ADDRESS = #{birthAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY_CARD = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
